name: Wing Commander: The Secret Missions
overview: You and the space carrier Tiger's Claw are engaged in a ferocious battle with the dreaded Kilrathi empire. Crossing into Kilrathi space, you come face to face with the ultimate threat to mankind: a weapon capable of destroying whole planets! In these heart-stopping missions you'll face challenges and enemies more dangerous than any you've ever seen. It's an intense, cinematic combat experience with you in total control!
